A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
So disappointing. As a huge Star Wars fan (EU included)\, I always try to have high hopes.  I wasn't the biggest Force Awakens fan\, but I understood why they choose the story they did and I like Rey's character (and Finn's and Kylo's\, for that matter). 

This movie was SO SLOW. The pacing was downright awful. The first payoff of any kind happened about 90 minutes in. Too long! The side stories were myriad and I found myself trying to figure out what to care about. When things finally started to get interesting and a few payoffs seen\, I was tired. They could've trimmed 30-40 minutes out of this movie and made it better.

Here's hoping for Episode IX... or SOLO\, for that matter.
